name: Ehci
tagline: Enhanced human computer interface through webcam image processing library.
body:
EHCI can be used as open source head tracking library. [Originally hosted here](https://code.google.com/p/ehci/) ## Showcase: [![EHCI demo](http://db.tt/UbxBmdPI)](http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=BovphSjw_tI)
***
GSoC 2008 project
![GSoC 2008](http://db.tt/7q0G6unN)
**Student:** Daniel Baggio
**Mentor:** Pawel Solyga
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
